thread.section_title: Derby Eiffel Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location and Views
thread.title_full: Great Location and Views - Review of Derby Eiffel Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: AaronAlexpt
title: Great Location and Views
text:
This hotel is in a great location. Close to metro stops and plenty of places nearby on foot. The front desk staff speak English well so that was nice since our French is terrible.
I have sleep issues and they were happy to accommodate us to a top floor room. We had a great view of the Eiffel Tower and never heard a sound from anyone else.
